org.apache.cocoon.transformation
Class MultiFragmentTraxTransformer

java.lang.Object
  TraxTransformer
      org.apache.cocoon.transformation.MultiFragmentTraxTransformer

public class MultiFragmentTraxTransformer
extends TraxTransformer

Apply a TrAX transformer to selected parts of the input document. Usage: 

       
         false
         false
         false
         xalan
         true
The multifragment transformer will apply the stylesheet 'multifragment.xsl' to all fragments in the input document. A fragment is a sub-document demarcated by an element with the name indicated by the 'fragment.element' parameter, in the namespace indicated by the 'fragment.namespace' parameter. Other parameters are passed on to the stylesheet. If the fragment-element is not in the namespace, the 'fragment.namespace' parameter must be omitted.

Version:
2007-02-19 Bugs: Although this version does not generate duplicate namespace-prefix declaration attributes, it will omit prefix mappings with the same prefix but different URI's.
